attributes.additional_details: I don't understand why university fees are getting more and more expensive yet some students are still looking for a job after 6 months AND THEN have to spend years paying off student debts. You say that all of us have a right to an education but some students, who are extremely clever, cannot afford to go to university. I am asking for you to lower the university fees far down from £9k a year, so we can all get the education that we deserve.
